issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Assigned to Tender issue #72. As reported in Tender:

I'm running Ubuntu Jaunty, updated to the latest mobile sdk and developer versions. I have a project that I imported from my mac successfully but when I click on "Test & Package" the screen is blank.

This same project back on my Mac is fine and I can test and package. The mac is running the latest versions of everything as well.

{html}
fields.summary: Via Tender: Test & Package screen is blank

comments.body:
{html}

this is fixed and will be available with the next developer update

{html}
